verses.verse: Now Korah, <S%H7141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar, <S%H3324><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> and Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab, <S%H446><s%> and On, <S%H203><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Peleth, <S%H6431><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> men:

And they rose <S%H6965><s%> up before <S%H6440><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> with certain <S%H582><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%> of the assembly, <S%H5712><s%> famous <S%H7148><s%> in the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of renown: <S%H8034><s%>

And they gathered <S%H6950><s%> themselves together against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, You take too much <S%H7227><s%> on you, seeing <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> are holy, <S%H6918><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one of them, and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is among <S%H8432><s%> them: why <S%H4069><s%> then lift <S%H5375><s%> you up yourselves above <S%H5921><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the LORD? <S%H3068><s%>
And when Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it, he fell <S%H5307><s%> on his face: <S%H6440><s%>

And he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Korah <S%H7141><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> his company, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Even to morrow <S%H1242><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will show <S%H3045><s%> who <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> are his, and who <S%H853><s%> is holy; <S%H6918><s%> and will cause him to come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to him: even him whom <S%H834><s%> he has chosen <S%H977><s%> will he cause to come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to him.
This <S%H2063><s%> do; <S%H6213><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> you censers, <S%H4289><s%> Korah, <S%H7141><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his company; <S%H5712><s%>

And put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> therein, <S%H2004><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> in them before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to morrow: <S%H4279><s%> and it shall be that the man <S%H376><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> does choose, <S%H977><s%> he shall be holy: <S%H6918><s%> you take too much <S%H7227><s%> on you, you sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi. <S%H3878><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Hear, <S%H8085><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, you sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi: <S%H3878><s%>

Seems it but a small <S%H4592><s%> thing to you, that the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> has separated <S%H914><s%> you from the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to bring <S%H7126><s%> you near <S%H7138><s%> to himself to do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> to them?

And he has brought <S%H7126><s%> you near <S%H7138><s%> to him, and all <S%H3605><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> with you: and seek <S%H1245><s%> you the priesthood <S%H3550><s%> also? <S%H1571><s%>

For which cause <S%H3651><s%> both you and all <S%H3605><s%> your company <S%H5712><s%> are gathered <S%H3259><s%> together against <S%H5921><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> is Aaron, <S%H175><s%> that you murmur <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him?

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to call <S%H7121><s%> Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab: <S%H446><s%> which said, <S%H559><s%> We will not come <S%H5927><s%> up:

Is it a small <S%H4592><s%> thing that you have brought <S%H5927><s%> us up out of a land <S%H776><s%> that flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> us in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> except <S%H3588><s%> you make yourself altogether <S%H1571><s%> a prince <S%H8323><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us?

Moreover <S%H637><s%> you have not brought <S%H935><s%> us into a land <S%H776><s%> that flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> or given <S%H5414><s%> us inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of fields <S%H7704><s%> and vineyards: <S%H3754><s%> will you put <S%H5365><s%> out the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of these <S%H1992><s%> men? <S%H582><s%> we will not come <S%H5927><s%> up.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> wroth, <S%H2734><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Respect <S%H6437><s%> not you their offering: <S%H4503><s%> I have not taken <S%H5375><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ass <S%H2543><s%> from them, neither <S%H3808><s%> have I hurt <S%H7489><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of them.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Be you and all <S%H3605><s%> your company <S%H5712><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> you, and they, and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> to morrow: <S%H4279><s%>

And take <S%H3947><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer, <S%H4289><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> in them, and bring <S%H7126><s%> you before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer, <S%H4289><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> censers; <S%H4289><s%> you also, and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> each <S%H376><s%> of you his censer. <S%H4289><s%>

And they took <S%H3947><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer, <S%H4289><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in them, and laid <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron. <S%H175><s%>

And Korah <S%H7141><s%> gathered <S%H6950><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Separate <S%H914><s%> yourselves from among <S%H8432><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> them in a moment. <S%H7281><s%>

And they fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces, <S%H6440><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O God, <S%H410><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of the spirits <S%H7307><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> shall one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> sin, <S%H2398><s%> and will you be wroth <S%H7107><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation? <S%H5712><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Get <S%H5927><s%> you up from about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Dathan, <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram. <S%H48><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up and went <S%H3212><s%> to Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram; <S%H48><s%> and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> followed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H310><s%> him.

And he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Depart, <S%H5493><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, from the tents <S%H168><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> wicked <S%H7563><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> and touch <S%H5060><s%> nothing <S%H408><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of their's, <S%H1992><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> you be consumed <S%H5595><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> their sins. <S%H2403><s%>

So they got <S%H5927><s%> up from the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Dathan, <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> every <S%H376><s%> side: <S%H5439><s%> and Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out, and stood <S%H5324><s%> in the door <S%H6607><s%> of their tents, <S%H168><s%> and their wives, <S%H802><s%> and their sons, <S%H1121><s%> and their little <S%H2945><s%> children. <S%H2945><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Hereby <S%H2063><s%> you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> works; <S%H4639><s%> for I have not done them of my own mind. <S%H3820><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> these <S%H428><s%> men die <S%H4191><s%> the common death <S%H4194><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> men, <S%H120><s%> or <S%H176><s%> if they be visited <S%H6485><s%> after the visitation <S%H6486><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> men; <S%H120><s%> then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has not sent <S%H7971><s%> me.

But if <S%H518><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> make <S%H1254><s%> a new <S%H1278><s%> thing, and the earth <S%H127><s%> open <S%H6475><s%> her mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and swallow <S%H1104><s%> them up, with all <S%H3605><s%> that appertain to them, and they go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> quick <S%H2416><s%> into the pit; <S%H7585><s%> then you shall understand <S%H3045><s%> that these men <S%H582><s%> have provoked <S%H5006><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, as he had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> that the ground <S%H127><s%> split <S%H1234><s%> asunder that was under <S%H8478><s%> them:

And the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> her mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and swallowed <S%H1104><s%> them up, and their houses, <S%H1004><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H120><s%> that appertained to Korah, <S%H7141><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their goods. <S%H7399><s%>

They, and all <S%H3605><s%> that appertained to them, went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%> into the pit, <S%H7585><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> closed <S%H3680><s%> on them: and they perished <S%H6><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the congregation. <S%H6951><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> that were round <S%H5439><s%> about them fled <S%H5127><s%> at the cry <S%H6963><s%> of them: for they said, <S%H559><s%> Lest <S%H6435><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> swallow <S%H1104><s%> us up also.

And there came <S%H3318><s%> out a fire <S%H784><s%> from the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and consumed <S%H398><s%> the two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that offered <S%H7126><s%> incense. <S%H7004><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H559><s%> to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> that he take <S%H7311><s%> up the censers <S%H4289><s%> out of the burning, <S%H8316><s%> and scatter <S%H2219><s%> you the fire <S%H784><s%> yonder; <S%H1973><s%> for they are hallowed. <S%H6942><s%>

The censers <S%H4289><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> sinners <S%H2400><s%> against their own souls, <S%H5315><s%> let them make them broad <S%H7555><s%> plates <S%H6341><s%> for a covering <S%H6826><s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%> for they offered <S%H7126><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> therefore they are hallowed: <S%H6942><s%> and they shall be a sign <S%H226><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the brazen <S%H5178><s%> censers, <S%H4289><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> they that were burnt <S%H8313><s%> had offered; <S%H7126><s%> and they were made broad <S%H7554><s%> plates for a covering <S%H6826><s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

To be a memorial <S%H2146><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that no <S%H3808><s%> stranger, <S%H376><s%> <S%H2114><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is not of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to offer incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> that he be not as Korah, <S%H7141><s%> and as his company: <S%H5712><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to him by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

But on <S%H5921><s%> the morrow <S%H4283><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> You have killed <S%H4191><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when the congregation <S%H5712><s%> was gathered <S%H6950><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> that they looked <S%H6437><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> it, and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared. <S%H7200><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> came <S%H935><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Get <S%H7426><s%> you up from among <S%H8432><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> them as in a moment. <S%H7281><s%> And they fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces. <S%H6440><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> a censer, <S%H4289><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> therein <S%H5921><s%> from off <S%H5921><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%> and go <S%H3212><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> to the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> and make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them: for there is wrath <S%H7110><s%> gone <S%H3318><s%> out from the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> the plague <S%H5063><s%> is begun. <S%H2490><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded, <S%H1696><s%> and ran <S%H7323><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the congregation; <S%H6951><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the plague <S%H5063><s%> was begun <S%H2490><s%> among the people: <S%H5971><s%> and he put <S%H5414><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%> and made an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the people. <S%H5971><s%>
And he stood <S%H5975><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the dead <S%H4191><s%> and the living; <S%H2416><s%> and the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed. <S%H6113><s%>

Now they that died <S%H4191><s%> in the plague <S%H4046><s%> were fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H7657><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> them that died <S%H4191><s%> about <S%H5921><s%> the matter <S%H1697><s%> of Korah. <S%H7141><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed. <S%H6113><s%>
